job.title: Software Integration Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a Software Integration Engineer in the Houston TX area This is a full time position onsite that includes great benefits including health dental vision 401K PTO and an annual bonusppbrppThis position will be working with the backend of several applications including the ServiceNow platform As a Software Integration Engineer your main responsibilities consists of communicating with various departments and understanding what needs to be done in developing solutions for various enterprise software systemsppbrppTechnical RequirementspulliSoftware development background in NETliliContainerization experience with Docker and KubernetesliliExperience developing applications in high availability clusters getting to ensure that they are cloud readyliliExperience integrating various applications with the ServiceNow platformliliAutomation experience with Ansible and TerraformliliExperience communicating with users to gather their requirementsliul
